Texts.Eng:
Melee weapons behave a little differently in FrackinUniverse. The most important changes are listed in this codex.

^orange;Combos^reset;
---------------
Each strike of a combo, whether or not it hits a target, consumes 1% of your energy. Be warned, tactics involving stun-locking enemies are no longer as viable.
Many weapons with combos provide additional bonuses when striking with these combos.

^orange;Shield Bash^reset;
---------------
Blocking with shields on enemies has a chance to Shield Bash. Certain gear can increase the Shield Bash chances.  

Shield Bash can damage foes, and send them reeling backwards. When Perfect Blocking, there is a 50% chance to Stun foes that are successfully bashed. When not perfect blocking, be wary: There is a chance -you- will get stunned on a badly timed block.

^orange;Hammer^reset;
---------------
The longer you hold the charge of this melee weapon type, the higher your Critical and Stun chance get (to a maximum of ^green;100^reset;%).
A hammer charged above ^green;75^reset;% will inflict a massive bonus eruption capable of stunning and tossing foes around.
Over-Charging the hammer past ^green;100^reset;% will automatically cancel the bonus.

^orange;Axe^reset;
---------------
Each consecutive kill made with an axe increases your maximum damage by +^green;1^reset;%, to a maximum of ^green;50^reset;%. 
If your health is reduced below ^red;20^reset;%, this bonus is cancelled.
Each consecutive hit in a row with an axe increases Crit Chance by +^green;3^reset;% (to a maximum of ^green;15^reset;%)

^orange;Dagger^reset;
---------------
Consecutive rapid kills temporarily increase damage 
+^green;25^reset;% Dodge Tech Efficiency
Combo Strikes increase Protection and Crit Chance with each strike. The protection bonus is greatest on First Strike, and reduces each hit thereafter.
^cyan;Dual-Wield (Melee):^reset; +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^orange;Shortsword^reset;
---------------
+1 Combo strike (was 2, now 3)
Each combo hit increases your Crit Damage amount
+^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance per Combo Strike
First Combo strike does +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage. Second hit does +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage.

^orange;Broadsword^reset;
---------------
Kills made in rapid succession increase defense for a short time
+^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance per Combo Strike
First Combo strike does +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage. Second hit does +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage.

^orange;Scythe^reset;
---------------
+^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance per Combo Strike
First Combo strike does +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage. Second hit does +^green;25^reset;% Crit Damage.

^orange;Longsword^reset;
---------------
3rd Combo Strike does +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
^cyan;Single Longsword^reset;: -^green;30^reset;% Combo Cooldown
^cyan;Longsword + Shield (Dual Wield)^reset;: +^green;4^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;1^reset; Shield Bash Push Distance, +^green;15^reset;% Healing Tech Efficiency, +^green;25^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Longsword + Any Weapon (Dual Wield)^reset;: Defense x^red;0.8^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^orange;Rapier^reset;
---------------
When wielding a rapier, the longer you wait between swings the higher your critical strike chance becomes (to a maximum of 5). Attacking resets this bonus.
^cyan;Single Rapier:^reset; +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;35^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Rapier + Dagger (Dual Wield):^reset; x^green;1.12^reset; Protection, +^green;15^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency

^orange;Shortspear^reset;
---------------
^cyan;Single Shortspear^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Crit Damage 
^cyan;Shortspear + Shield^reset;: +^green;10^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;2^reset; Shield Push Distance, Shield Regen x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;50^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Shortspear + Shortspear (Dual Wield)^reset;: Defense x^red;0.8^reset;, Bonus Crit Chance x^red;0.5^reset;

^orange;Quarterstaff^reset;
---------------
Each hit with a combo increases your Defense.

^orange;Mace^reset;
---------------
Combo strikes increase Stun Chance by 2% per hit.
^cyan;Single Mace^reset;: +^green;2^reset;% Stun Chance
^cyan;Mace + Shield^reset;: +^green;3^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;1^reset; Shield Push Distance, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
^cyan;Mace + Any Weapon (Dual Wield)^reset;: Bonus Crit Chance x^red;0.85^reset;, Bonus Stun Chance x^red;0.5^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^orange;Katana^reset; 
---------------
Each swing grants a Movement Speed bonus of ^green;1 + (combo step / 10)^reset;%
Combo hits increase knockback resistance
^cyan;Single Katana^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Katana + Heavy Melee (Dual Wield)^reset;: Damage x^red;0.8^reset;, Defense x^red;0.9^reset;
^cyan;Katana + Light Melee (Dual Wield)^reset;: Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;25^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency

^orange;Addendum^reset;
---------------
Bonus Crit/Stun Chance refer to stats that are not inherent on the weapons themselves, such as from armor or consumables.
Changes to Weapons and Combat in FU.
View in your Tricorder Codex tab in the '?' section
